author: ciaranmcveigh
content:
hey quick question does any know if blinded beacon blocks are still to use the domain type DOMAIN_BEACON_PROPOSER as specified in the phase0 Beacon Chain spec - im guessing yes but wanted to double check 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/beacon-chain.md

Thanks for any help

author: tersec
content: yes

author: tersec
content: they have to -- the gimmick here is that `blsSign(blinded block) == blsSign(unblinded block)`

author: tersec
content: which implies same signing domain
